title: @SUMA_renumber_FS
description: This script processes FreeSurfer-generated parcellation files and produces various derived datasets and segmentation maps.

ren_all.title: Renumbered parcellation
ren_all.description: Whole parcellation/segmentation file with renumbered ROIs.

ren_vent.title: Ventricles and choroid plexus segmentation
ren_vent.description: Ventricles and choroid plexus tissue segmentation map.

ren_othr.title: Other tissue segmentation
ren_othr.description: Other tissue segmentation map (optic chiasm, non-WM-hypointens, etc.).

ren_unkn.title: Unknown tissue segmentation
ren_unkn.description: Unknown tissue segmentation map (FS-defined 'unknown', with voxel value >0).

fs_ap_wm.title: White matter mask
fs_ap_wm.description: White matter mask (excluding the dotted part from FS).

ren_lbl_table.title: Labeltable
ren_lbl_table.description: Labeltable of the new ROI values.
